name: ocean cleanup (Paloz)
description:
collect as much trash as possible!

save the ocean!

hold x to shut the music up (press x again to resume)

arrow keys to move your lazy ass

collect trash to gain points that are displayed top left obiously

timer at top in case you are blind

red trash simbols means thet in that drektion there is trash

oil puddles make recicling more dificult so -1 points

if you have negative points that counts as oil colection (thats good)

have fun (very important)

tipe the timer limit you wanna set yourself now

heres the game in scratch:https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/601066825/
